unique_passive_1: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret attacks).
unique_passive_2: Taking physical damage from champions grants you a shield that absorbs 10 – 120 (based on level) (+ 4% maximum health) physical damage for 4 seconds (15 second cooldown).
motd:
Hotfix: • Noxian Endurance base shield reduced to 10 – 120 (based on level) from 10 – 140 (based on level). 

  • Noxian Endurance cooldown increased to 15 seconds from 12.
unique_passive_4: Requires *Blessing of Noxus* and two Legendary-tier items equipped.
